div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: Group 1 Mapping from https://www.phast.fr/ciodm/|2025 to Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM)
Group 2 Mapping from https://www.phast.fr/ciodm/|2025 to http://standardterms.edqm.eu

description.value: ConceptMap pour la conversion des codes d'unité d'administration de médicaments entre CIO et UCUM / EDQM
